name: ELEVANCE HEALTH, INC. (FORMERLY REPORTED AS ANTHEM, INC.)
description: Community focused managed care company with an emphasis on public sector health care
sampleDescriptions: Tax issues related to health insurance industry tax, H.R. 246.
